TopicTitle: A fun recreation build! Lost in Space!

Articles.Content:
Build the Jupiter 15 from Lost in Space! Specs and images are in the link.

Goals:

Normal: Build one, and launch to LKO

Stretch: Build one, and VTOL to LKO

Jeb: Build one, and fly to Mun

Val: Fly one to Jool, and land on one of the moons.

Secret: Land on Jool! Matt Lowne did this, so I bet somebody on here could!

 

Link to specs: Jupiter spacecraft | Lost in Space Wiki | Fandom

I can't believe the fandom knows all these details!
